chat_history.message:
Hello, 
My iPhone 12 mini has the above problem: 
Good morning, unfortunately I have to report this to you. The device is absolutely junk. Initially, it immediately caught my eye that the rear glass may not be original because it never fell off (despite case, etc.), but after a week, it shattered. But well, one doesn't complain about that anyway. In addition, the microphone quality is terrible. When recording audio or making calls, the mic seems to be destroyed or defective, making it so sensitive that even a simple finger on the back of the phone is enough to make the conversation unintelligible. Lastly, I now commit the greatest impertinence by making the phone completely unusable after 1.5 months. The battery showed me out of nowhere a warning about an unknown component. Since then, the phone has been OVERALL NOT USEFUL AT ALL! Even with constant charging, it runs out after less than a minute. So I even had trouble setting it back up. I demand a new phone or refund. Because it can't be that I get something like this despite excellent condition. Everyone would get annoyed.
Best regards,
Finja W.

Thank you for your help,

Hallo,

der Verkäufer kann die Rücksendung aufgrund des folgenden Problems noch nicht durchführen: Produkt ist außerhalb der Garantie.
Er hat weitere Details in dieser Nachricht hinterlegt: Dear Backcare,

We confirmed the receipt of the device, however after inspecting, we found that the phone was cracked at the back. As per the Back Market quality charter, we are unable to make a repair or exchange the product which is our warranty, and hence non compliant. Kindly check with the customer if the address below is correct: 

Finja Wieseke
Ebertystraße 23
10249 Berlin
Germany
0176 78020300

Thank you.

Regards,
CH

Dear Backcare,

The order will be shipped with DPD. The tracking number is: 10084001673827.

Regards,

Hello Finja, You can find your return label attached to this message. Your return will be processed by Chronopost. Simply drop off your package at a nearby drop-off location. You can find a list of locations here: Before you prepare your return, follow these steps: 1. Find instructions on how to return an item 2. Don't forget to include any accessories that came with your product 3. Remove any existing protective cover or film 4. Package your product and its accessories according to the tips below: How to package your product: • The box should be sturdy and stable, and your product should be positioned in a way that it won't move during transit. • Attach the return label on top of the box (you can also attach a spare label inside for identification purposes if the original one is lost or damaged). • Take photos of the package from the inside and outside before sending it. This will protect you in case your product gets damaged during transit. Your return is now ready to be dropped off! We'll notify you as soon as it arrives at our facility. Best regards, Back Market Customer Care, Back Market Customer Care
